trans-unit.source: Represents a splitter control that enables the user to resize docked controls.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用户能够调整停靠的控件的大小的拆分器控件。

trans-unit.source: Splitter has been replaced by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器已被取代<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: The Splitter control enables the user to resize controls that are docked to the edges of the Splitter control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器控件使用户能够调整与拆分器控件的边缘停靠在运行时的控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: When the user passes the mouse pointer over the Splitter control, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls docked to the Splitter control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 当用户将鼠标指针经过拆分器控件时，光标会改变以指示控件停靠到拆分器控件可以调整大小。

trans-unit.source: The Splitter control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器控件使用户能够调整停靠在停靠顺序之前的控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control you want the user to be able to resize to an edge of a container, and then dock a splitter to the same side of that container.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要启用用户后，若要调整停靠的控件的大小，将您希望用户能够调整到的容器，的控件停靠并且然后将拆分器停靠到该容器的同侧。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to a form and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Left`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要创建类似于 Windows 资源管理器窗口，添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>到窗体控件，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Left`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Add a Splitter control to the form and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Left` as well.
trans-unit.target: 拆分器控件添加到窗体，并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Left`也。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: To complete the form layout, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> occupy the remaining space on the form.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成窗体布局，添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件并设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>属性`DockStyle.Fill`能够<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>占据窗体上的剩余空间。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: At run time, the user can then resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control (as well as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control) by moving the Splitter control.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，用户可以然后调整大小的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件 (以及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件) 通过移动拆分器控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the Splitter control does not resize controls docked to a size that is too small to be useful to the user, you use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 为了确保拆分器控件不调整大小太小，无法对用户有用停靠的控件的大小，则使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> properties determine the minimum size that controls docked to the left and right (or top and bottom if a horizontal Splitter control) can be sized to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A>属性确定控件的最小大小停靠在左侧和右侧 （或顶部和底部如果水平拆分器控件） 可调整到。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the other controls on your form that the Splitter control is docked to display a specific style of border, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.BorderStyle%2A> property to match the border style of the controls that are docked to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果其他控制拆分器控件停靠以显示特定的边框样式窗体上，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.BorderStyle%2A>属性以匹配到其中。 停靠的控件的边框样式</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: You might want to set a maximum size limit on controls that the Splitter control is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要停靠在拆分器控件的控件上设置的最大大小限制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> events enable you to determine when the user is resizing a docked control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>事件使您能够确定当用户正在调整大小的停靠的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A> property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> events to determine the size of the control that the Splitter control is docked to and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A> property to a different value to limit the docked control's width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally aligned Splitter control).
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A>的事件处理程序中的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>事件，以确定是停靠变为拆分器控件，并已将其设置控件的大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A>属性为不同的值来限制对指定的最大宽度 （或如果水平对齐的拆分器控件的高度） 的停靠的控件的宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Resizing a control using the Splitter control can only be done using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 调整大小使用拆分器控件的控件只能完成使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to access the Splitter control using the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 不能访问使用键盘的拆分器控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> class.
<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> has been replaced by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref>, and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>已替换为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref>，并且仅为与早期版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A> properties are set to 25.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is set to `DockStyle.Left` by default.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles"></xref> values.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
To be added.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> values.
This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
To be added.
Gets or sets the style of border for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的边框的样式。

trans-unit.source: BorderStyle has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 BorderStyle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used when the controls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is docked to are displayed with a specific border style and you want the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control to match their display style.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常是使用控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠与特定的边框样式显示，并且你想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件使其显示样式。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control will be docked to that you want to display without any borders, you can set the BorderStyle property to `BorderStyle.None`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件将在你想要显示而无需任何边框，你可以将 BorderStyle 属性设置为停靠到`BorderStyle.None`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_BorderStyle.None" name="BorderStyle.None" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> values.
Returns the parameters needed to create the handle.
trans-unit.target: 返回创建句柄所需的参数。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this property to provide extra functionality.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此属性以提供额外的功能。

trans-unit.source: Be sure, however, that these classes call `base.getCreateParams()` first to get the structure containing the basic information.
trans-unit.target: 请确保，但是，这些类调用`base.getCreateParams()`才能获得包含基本信息的结构。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> ，其中包含需要的创建参数时创建该控件的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default cursor for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的默认光标。

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> representing the current default cursor.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref>表示当前默认光标。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取此控件支持的默认输入法编辑器 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.
Gets the default size of the control.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示控件的默认大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置哪些<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>边框停靠到其父控件，并确定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>随其父级一起调整大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Dock 属性用于定义如何调整控件的自动调整其父控件的大小时。

trans-unit.source: You can only set the Dock property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以仅将停靠属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control enables the user to resize the docked control that is immediately before it in the docking order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件使用户能够调整停靠在停靠顺序之前的控件的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to enable the user to resize a docked control, dock the control to an edge of a container, and then dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control to the same side of that container.
trans-unit.target: 因此，若要启用用户后，若要调整停靠的控件的大小，将该控件停靠到容器的边缘，然后停靠<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件添加到该容器的同侧。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the example in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>类</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>中的示例

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
Dock is not set to one of the valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 停靠未设置为一个有效<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

To be added.
This property is not relevant to this class.
This property is not relevant to this class.
The font of the text displayed by the control.
trans-unit.target: 由控件显示的文本的字体。

This event is not relevant to this class.

The foreground color of the control.

One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode"></xref> values.

This event is not relevant to this class.

This event is not relevant to this class.
This event is not relevant to this class.
To be added.
Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器控件的容器 （或停靠该侧的最近控件） 的另一侧的边缘之间必须保持的最小距离。

trans-unit.source: MinExtra has been replaced by similar properties in <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"></xref> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 中的类似属性已替换为 MinExtra <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer"> </xref> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the top or bottom of a container), the minimum height of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠到顶部或底部容器)，留待未停靠的控件的容器的区域的最小高度为此值减去的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the left or right of a container), the minimum width of the area of the container reserved for undocked controls is this value minus the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠左侧或右侧的容器)，留待未停靠的控件的容器的区域的最小宽度为此值减去的宽度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能移动拆分器过去的此属性指定的限制。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the MinExtra property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> MinExtra 属性设置为负值，如果属性值重置为 0。

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control and the edge of the opposite side of the container (or the closest control docked to that side).
trans-unit.target: 之间的最小距离，以像素为单位， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref>控件和容器 （或停靠该侧的最近控件） 的另一侧的边缘。

trans-unit.source: The default is 25.
Gets or sets the minimum distance that must remain between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器控件与该控件停靠到容器边缘之间必须保持的最小距离。

trans-unit.source: MinSize has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 MinSize <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the minimum height of the resizable control.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠到顶部或底部容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的最小高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the minimum width of the resizable control.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠左侧或右侧的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的最小宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: The user cannot move the splitter past the limit specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 用户不能移动拆分器过去的此属性指定的限制。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the MinSize property is set to a negative value, the property value is reset to 0.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> MinSize 属性设置为负值，如果属性值重置为 0。

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance, in pixels, between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 之间的最小距离，以像素为单位， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref>控件与该控件停靠到容器边缘。

trans-unit.source: The default is 25.
This method is not relevant to this class.
This method is not relevant to this class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown"></xref> event.
The OnMouseDown method begins dragging the `Splitter` control to resize the docked control that is immediately before `Splitter` in the docking order.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseDown 方法开始拖动`Splitter`控件调整停靠的控件前立即`Splitter`停靠顺序。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove"></xref> event.

If the user holds down left mouse button and moves the mouse, the OnMouseMove method moves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control to resize the docked control that is immediately before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> in the docking order.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户按住鼠标左键并移动鼠标时，会将移 OnMouseMove 方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件调整停靠的控件前立即<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>停靠顺序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref> event.
The OnMouseUp method resizes the docked control that is immediately before Splitter in the docking order.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseUp 方法调整大小之前的固定顺序的拆分器的停靠的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved"></xref> event.
OnSplitterMoved has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnSplitterMoved%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 OnSplitterMoved <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnSplitterMoved%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnSplitterMoved method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSplitterMoved 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving"></xref> event.
OnSplitterMoving has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnSplitterMoving%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 OnSplitterMoving <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnSplitterMoving%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
The OnSplitterMoving method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnSplitterMoving 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitterEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
Performs the work of setting the specified bounds of this control.
trans-unit.target: 执行设置此控件的指定的边界的工作。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Left*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Top*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width*> property value of the control.
The new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height*> property value of the control.
A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the distance between the splitter control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置拆分器控件与该控件停靠到容器边缘之间的距离。

trans-unit.source: SplitPosition has been replaced by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 SplitPosition <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the top or bottom of a container), this value is the height of the resizable control.
trans-unit.target: 对于水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠到顶部或底部容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control (a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control docked to the left or right of a container), this value is the width of the resizable control.
trans-unit.target: 对于垂直<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件 (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠左侧或右侧的容器)，此值是可调整大小的控件的宽度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SplitPosition property in an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> events to determine the size of the control that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is docked to and limit its width to a specified maximum width (or height if a horizontally docked <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在事件处理程序中使用 SplitPosition 属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving>事件，以确定控件的大小，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠到和限制其宽度和一个指定的最大宽度 (或如果水平停靠的高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoving> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>

trans-unit.source: The distance, in pixels, between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control and the container edge that the control is docked to.
trans-unit.target: 距离，以像素为单位，之间<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>控件与该控件停靠到容器边缘。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control is not bound to a control, the value is -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>控件不绑定到控件，则值为-1。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is moved.
trans-unit.target: 当移动拆分器控件时发生。

trans-unit.source: SplitterMoved has been replaced by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved"></xref> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 SplitterMoved <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved"> </xref> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the SplitterMoved event to perform resize validation in your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序 SplitterMoved 事件以在你的应用程序中执行大小调整验证。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is docked to the edges of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can write code in the SplitterMoved event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls has been exceeded and resize the controls to their minimum or maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠与边缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，你可以 SplitterMoved 事件来确定是否在编写代码的最小值和/或最大大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件已超过和调整到其最小值或最大大小控件的大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Occurs when the splitter control is in the process of moving.
trans-unit.target: 当拆分器控件正处在移动过程中时发生。

trans-unit.source: SplitterMoving has been replaced by <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving"></xref> and is provided only for compatibility with previous versions.
trans-unit.target: 已被取代 SplitterMoving <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving"> </xref> ，仅为与以前版本的兼容性提供。

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the SplitterMoving event to perform resize validation in your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建的事件处理程序 SplitterMoving 事件以在你的应用程序中执行大小调整验证。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control is docked to the edges of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control, you can write code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> event to determine if the minimum and/or maximum size for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls has been exceeded and restrict the resizing of the controls to their minimum or maximum size.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控件停靠与边缘<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控件和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件，你可以在编写代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved>事件来确定是否的最小值和/或最大大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控件已超过和限制其最小值或最大大小的控件的大小调整。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.SplitterMoved> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果启用，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

This event is not relevant to this class.

Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，表示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ToString method returns a string that includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ToString 方法将返回一个字符串，包括类型和值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinExtra%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter.MinSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Splitter"> </xref>。
